trans-unit.source: Provides data for <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving"></xref> and the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved"></xref> events.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved"> </xref> eventi.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving> event occurs when the user is moving the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving>evento si verifica quando l'utente si sposta il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved> event occurs when the user finishes moving the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved>evento si verifica quando l'utente termina lo spostamento di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved>

trans-unit.source: The SplitterEventArgs class specifies the position of the mouse pointer and the position of the upper-left corner of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control.
trans-unit.target: La classe SplitterEventArgs specifica la posizione del puntatore del mouse e la posizione dell'angolo superiore sinistro del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified coordinates of the mouse pointer and the coordinates of the upper-left corner of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza un'istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs"> </xref> classe specificato dalle coordinate del puntatore del mouse e le coordinate dell'angolo superiore sinistro del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the mouse pointer (in client coordinates).
trans-unit.target: La coordinata x del puntatore del mouse (espressa in coordinate client).

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the mouse pointer (in client coordinates).
trans-unit.target: La coordinata y del puntatore del mouse (espressa in coordinate client).

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"></xref> (in client coordinates).
trans-unit.target: La coordinata x dell'angolo superiore sinistro del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"> </xref> (espressa in coordinate client).

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"></xref> (in client coordinates).
trans-unit.target: Coordinata y dell'angolo superiore sinistro del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"> </xref> (espressa in coordinate client).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"></xref> (in client coordinates).
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la coordinata x dell'angolo superiore sinistro del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"> </xref> (espressa in coordinate client).

trans-unit.source: You can use this property along with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs.SplitY%2A> property of this class to determine the position of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved> events are raised.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questa proprietà insieme al <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs.SplitY%2A>proprietà di questa classe per determinare la posizione del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>controllare quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved>gli eventi vengono generati.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs.SplitY%2A>

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the control.
trans-unit.target: La coordinata x dell'angolo superiore sinistro del controllo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"></xref> (in client coordinates).
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la coordinata y dell'angolo superiore sinistro del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"> </xref> (espressa in coordinate client).

trans-unit.source: You can use this property along with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs.SplitX%2A> property of this class to determine the position of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved> events are raised.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questa proprietà insieme al <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs.SplitX%2A>proprietà di questa classe per determinare la posizione del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>controllare quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved>gli eventi vengono generati.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs.SplitX%2A>

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the control.
trans-unit.target: La coordinata y dell'angolo superiore sinistro del controllo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the x-coordinate of the mouse pointer (in client coordinates).
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la coordinata x del puntatore del mouse (espressa in coordinate client).

trans-unit.source: You can use this property along with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs.Y%2A> property of this class to determine the current location of the mouse pointer when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved> events are raised.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questa proprietà con il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs.Y%2A>proprietà di questa classe per determinare la posizione corrente del puntatore del mouse quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved>gli eventi vengono generati.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs.Y%2A>

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: La coordinata x del puntatore del mouse.

trans-unit.source: Gets the y-coordinate of the mouse pointer (in client coordinates).
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la coordinata y del puntatore del mouse (espressa in coordinate client).

trans-unit.source: You can use this property along with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs.X%2A> property of this class to determine the current location of the mouse pointer when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved> events are raised.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questa proprietà con il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs.X%2A>proprietà di questa classe per determinare la posizione corrente del puntatore del mouse quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved>gli eventi vengono generati.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: La coordinata y del puntatore del mouse.
